TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PublishingPageStatusIndicator extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl
Public NotInheritable Class PublishingPageStatusIndicator Inherits WebControl
public ref class PublishingPageStatusIndicator sealed : System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebControl

Docs.summary: Represents a control that indicates the status of the current page.

remarks.para: The output of this control is text that represents the status of the current page, such as published, waiting for approval, approved, or rejected. This text is rendered as a link to a dialog box with information about the page versions.
